page.title: 16FASHION WEST FLEGG
page.content: Fashion in the 80's is quite interesting at the moment.It has changed a lot because now the fashion for girls is short,tight skirts and low backed tops.For boys it is mainly baggy jeans with zips and pockets in with a baggy jumper or a Chinese writing top.Fashion for hair styles in the 80's is short,spiky hair and also either bleached or streaked hair.Some people are going for hair which has got lots of colours in such as bright red,luminous green,yellow and orange etc...People go for luminous socks as well and belts also greys and blacks are in fashion.In the schools you have to wear uniform which is not fashionable.It is a white shirt,blue skirt,blue jumper,and in the summer a blue and white checked dress.Fashion is usually brightly coloured clothing.
